ygData.subject: Whoohoo
ygData.msgSnippet: had a litle fun tonight. I didn t like my Human Necro that much, mainley because he was in Qeynos.. I can live.. (well die most of the time) with all the KOS
ygData.messageBody:
had a litle fun tonight. I didn't like my Human
Necro that much, mainley because he was in Qeynos.. I
can live.. (well die most of the time) with all the
KOS you get but the city lacked appeal from the Necro
point of view. Let's face it crawling around sewers
just isn't my style. Also I just can't find a real
affinety with the Bertoxxulous deity making roleplay a big
no no. <br>So I decieded to delete the character and
create a new one, this time in Freeport following
Innoruuk... So far nothing to funny right? :) Well the first
thing I did was NOT going to look up my guild, but
going to Nektulos. I didn't encounter any bears or
skellies on my way thank Innoruuk, and made it al the way
to the city. Guards conned my Dubiosly.<br>So I
decieded to go inside and see How far I could go. To my
suprice i could go all the way to 3th gate. The only ones
not liking me where the Ghouls at the entrance of the
lodge of the dead. <br>So I had to make some money and
ask somebody to buy the spell Invis. VS Undead for
me... Which nobody wanted to do because I was Human...
(normally they never roleplay but if I need a favor they
suddendly ALL do). So i logged of and back on as my main
char. Yargon, DE SK. I asked around through the guild
channel this time and after A litle while got somebody to
help. I bought a cracked staff and the first lvl spells
put them in a backpack and had them given to My newby
Necro Nebulos. I also had secured a bind in the city in
the mean time.<br>And I must say it's been a blast..
I hardly have come around to some leveling because
I got to answer questions all the time... "Taught
humans where KOS here?"and stuff like that :)<br>Yup it
feels nice being a litle uniqe in the EQ world :P I
know most have nevert seen a naked lvl1 necro running
around in Nektulos before :P
